definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: He hoped to form a new civilization in our county under the instruction of bout in and out.
sentences.chinese: 希冀在“补泻兼用”的“药方”指导下形成新的文明。

definition: interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
treatment involving the use of tonics to restore the patient's health/reinforcing method (in acupuncture)
diagnosis and treatment based on an overall analysis of the illness and the patient's condition

acupuncture point (any point on any meridian)/category of 12 specific acupuncture points near the wrist or ankle, each lying on a different meridian (one of five categories collectively termed 五輸穴|五输穴)
pattern-syndrome identification based on the eight principles (TCM)
"eight principles," a method of giving a general description and syndrome differentiation (TCM)
to blend two or more medicines/compatibility (of herbal remedies, medicines)
to apply a treatment/to undertake a therapy
